DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: APPANNABABU, S;APPANNABABU, S.;A. Selaboina;BABU. A;BABU, A.;APPNNABABU, S.

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: I have done my Ph.D from The Maharaja Sayaji Rao University of Baroda (2011) in low energy nuclear reactions. I worked as a post-doc fellow at Inter University Accelerator Centre, New Delhi (2011 - 2012) and Legnaro National Laboratories, Italy (2012 - 2014). I am currently working as a post-doc fellow at University of Sao Paulo under FAPESP fellowship. My field of interests are nuclear reactions involving weakly bound stable and unstable projectiles, transfer reactions and fusion-fission dynamics in medium and heavy compound nuclei.

DOUTORADO.TITULO-DA-DISSERTACAO-TESE: Study of fusion fission dynamics through fission fragment angular and mass distributions

POS-DOUTORADO.NOME-AGENCIA: Fundaусo de Amparo Я Pesquisa do Estado de Sсo Paulo

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: I worked on the experiment and data analysis of neutron multiplicities and fission fragment mass distributions for the reaction 50Ti + 208Pb at 294 MeV. This experiment was performed with the collaboration of BARC, Mumbai group in order to study the binary fragmentation and compound nucleus fission for the super heavy nuclei 258Rf. I am associated with NUCL-EX group, in the setting-up, data taking and analysis of the 25Mg(α,n)28Si which has strong impact on the 26Al production in stars. I am also involved in different experiments in the field of reaction dynamics at low energy in the framework of the NUCL-EX collaboration using the 8PLP and GARFIELD + Rco array for charged particle and fragment detection.

I worked as a Research Associate at Inter University Accelerator Centre (Formerly Known as Nuclear Science Centre) at New Delhi in the up-gradation of National Array of Neutron Detectors (NAND). The set-up of NAND array consists of 20 neutron detectors and two multi wire proportional counters (MWPC) to detect neutrons and fission fragments emitted in a fusion-fission reaction. I worked in first phase of the up-gradation of NAND array to 50 neutron detectors and four MWPC's. I have been actively involved in the testing of newly brought and home made detectors, electronics and data acquisition systems etc. I am also involved in the analysis of the data obtained from the test runs.
